title: FS: C46 Tony Smith Imperial Tobacco
author: GrayGhost

posts.post_title: FS: C46 Tony Smith Imperial Tobacco
posts.post_content:
Last and best of my type cards left Im selling . A few more upcoming next week probably. this one is very cool. C46 Imperial Tobacco of Tony Smith. Card has a crease and some rounding, but looks really nice for the grade. Pretty nice back too.

Graded Good plus, PSA 2.5

45.00 shipped/insured price. PM to reserve and THANKS
